package.name: jsx3.html
package.text: Utility methods related to rendering HTML.

nested.name: jsx3.html.BlockTag
nested.text: Represents an HTML element that occupies a rectangle of the screen.

nested.name: jsx3.html.DOM
nested.text: Handles Provides methods to manipulate browser DOM nodes.

nested.name: jsx3.html.Style
nested.text: Handles Provides methods to manipulate browser DOM nodes.

nested.name: jsx3.html.FontTag
nested.text: Represents an HTML element that defines font styles.

method.name: copy
method.text: Copies the given string of text to the clipboard

method.name: getJSXParent

param.name: objServer
param.text: if provided, only return a DOM node from this server.

method.text: Traverses the browser DOM up from objGUI and returns the first GI DOM node that contains objGUI.

method.name: getOuterHTML
method.text: Returns the serialized HTML representation of objElement.

method.name: loadImages

param.name: varImages
param.text: one or more relative URIs to image files. Each URI will be resolved against the default resolver.

method.text: Pre-loads images into the HTML page so that they are available immediately when a control paints them.

method.name: paste
method.text: Returns the current text content of the clipboard

method.name: scrollIntoView

param.name: objRoot
param.text: optionally, the last parent to reveal objGUI relative to.

param.name: intPaddingX
param.text: the desired horizontal pixel padding after revealing, if null then no horizontal repositioning if at least part of the DOM element is showing.

param.name: intPaddingY
param.text: the desired vertical pixel padding after revealing, if null then no vertical repositioning if at least part of the DOM element is showing.

method.text: Reveals a DOM element by scrolling the necessary parent DIVs and SPANs.

method.name: setInnerText
method.text: Replaces the children of objElement with a text node of value strText.

method.name: setOuterHTML
method.text: Replaces objElement with an HTML snippet, strHTML.
